name: Nomori Prototype
description:
Nomori is a prototype for a mind-bending third-person puzzle game. Play as Kiko and explore a twisted and magical spirit world. Rotate portals to change your perspective and reverse the timeflow of objects to solve puzzles.

*

Nomori is still in development by Enchanted Works, or Marnix Licht, Myrthe ter Pelle, Geoffrey Hendrikx, Erik Wiersma and Joeri Ridder.
